short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A basic extension to add some extra functionality to Roll20

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A basic extension to add some extra functionality to Roll20

The purpose of this extension is to add a few features to the Roll20 website, written for me and my friends but should work for anyone who wants it.

* Update 1.0.4
Added text editor
Fixed a reconnection bug.

* Update 1.0.3
Added live changes for all notes & charts
